card_text: If this card is in your GY: You can discard 1 "Vendread" card; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. A "Vendread" monster Ritual Summoned using this card on the field gains the following effect. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Vendread Houndhorde" once per turn.$N‚óèOnce per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; banish it.
